item.description:
NOT a MEETUP- JUST an EVENT NOTICE fyi!

The MIT Asian Dance Team is having a HUGE showcase extravaganza this
Saturday at 84 Mass. Ave. Cambridge
(closest T is Central Square or Mass Ave #1 bus)
8-10pm
upstairs in the Student Center, in Sala de Puerto Rico
Tickets are only $6 at the door
(or $5 online at http://sao.mit.edu/ti.... There will be a ton of Chinese traditional and folk dances.

VIVIAN is attending- go on your own or you can email her through the group website if you want to try to meet with her to go there.

The website describes the dance performances as "Korean hip hop through Chinese traditional dance"

Sounds fun!
About this Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Asian Dance showcase!
